attributes.action: Publish the Chilcot Inquiry or Impeach Tony Blair
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls on the government of the day to publish the Chilcot Inquiry into the Iraq War before the 2015 general election and if that is not the case, for proceedings to begin on the impeachment of Tony Blair through official process' of justice and redress.

It is the case that without the publishing of the Chilcot Inquiry, it is unlikely there is any evidence to support Impeachment, this is a travesty in a country with such a history of judicial imperative and makes a mockery of all who do not and will not hold power in this country.

We the people call for a firm timeline on the publishing of Chilcot, the reasons it can't be published before 2015 and alternative routes to see justice done being created or utilised in relation to Iraq and what Mr Anthony Charles Lynton Blair and those involved may or may not have done.
